title: Access Claude Code from mobile with full harness

brief.why: Claude Code is terminal-only. Full experience (MCPs, CLAUDE.md, skills, tools) needs to be accessible from phone/tablet on home network, using MAX subscription instead of API billing.
brief.what: 1. ClaudeCodeAgent adapter implementing pi-web-ui Agent interface 2. JSONL event mapper (CC events → pi AgentEvents) 3. Node.js bridge server (WebSocket ↔ stdio) 4. Web app shell with pi-web-ui components 5. Directory picker for session launch 6. Tool execution viewer 7. AskUserQuestion mobile rendering
brief.done: Can open browser on phone, pick a project directory, chat with Claude Code, see streaming responses and tool executions, tap AskUserQuestion options, and resume sessions after disconnect

title: Scaffold project and wire up pi-web-ui

brief.why: Need working build pipeline before writing adapter code. pi-web-ui packages are on npm, need Vite bundler with Tailwind.
brief.what: 1. npm init with type:module 2. Install pi-web-ui, pi-agent-core, pi-ai, mini-lit, lit 3. Vite config with Tailwind plugin 4. Minimal index.html + main.ts loading AgentInterface 5. Verify components render
brief.done: npm run dev serves a page with pi-web-ui chat interface visible (even if non-functional)

brief.why: Long mobile sessions will hit context limits. Need to understand how CC handles this in stream-json — does context_management fire? Are messages silently dropped?
brief.what: 1. Start long conversation 2. Feed many messages until context pressure 3. Observe context_management events 4. Document behaviour
brief.done: Documented what happens at context limits, bridge knows how to handle it
